roleset.name: fall
roleset.note: TUMBLE-V NOTES: Comparison with fall.. Member of Vncls calibratable_cos-45.6-1, meander-47.7, escape-51.1-2, mix-22.1-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from tumble.01-v)

example.name: boring ergative
example.text: On days when-1 prices are tumbling *trace*-1, they must be willing to buy shares from sellers when no one else will.

example.name: with EXT and destination
example.text: After troubled Heritage Media proposed acquiring POP Radio in a stock swap , POP Radio's shares tumbled 4 to 14 3/4.
example.arg: After troubled Heritage Media proposed acquiring POP Radio in a stock swap

example.name: 'on volume' of XYZ
example.text: MCI Communications tumbled 2 5/8 to 42 3/8 on 4.7 million shares even though the telecommunications giant reported a 63% increase in third-quarter profit.
example.arg: even though the telecommunications giant reported a 63 % increase in third-quarter profit

example.name: with agent
example.text: Some fruit visionaries say the Fuji could someday tumble the Red Delicious from the top of America's apple heap.
example.arg: from the top of America's apple heap
